title: 7-year-old dead, three others wounded in east side shooting
content:
A suspect is in custody after a shooting on the near east side of Columbus left one child dead and other others wounded.
The gunfire was reported just after 4:00 p.m. Friday at the Express Mart, near East 5th Avenue and Peters Avenue.
Columbus police tell 10TV 18-year-old Marctarius K. Grace fired shots into a car, hitting four people.
One of those victims, 7-year-old Deonte M. Fisher, died from a gunshot wound to the head.
Deonte M. Fisher
Two other juveniles and 19-year-old Rayquan Holloway were taken to the hospital for treatment.
This is the same area where two people were shot and wounded in January. According to police, one suspect was standing at the front door of the Express Mart when he fired several shots at the victims who were in a parked vehicle.
